item.title: Untradable Capes! All added! Non-Trimmed, trimmed, and hoods!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey, I took a while to add all the skill capes into the non tradable int, just take all these codes and add it in…

All capes:

10704,10705,10706,10707,10708,10709,10710,10711,10712,10713,10714,10715,10716,10717,10718,10719,10720,10721,10722,10723,10724,10725,10726,10727,10728,10729,10730,10731,10732,10733,10734,10735,10736,10737,10738,10739,10740,10741,10742,10743,10744,10745,10746,10747,10748,10749,10750,10751,10752,10753,10754,10755,10756,10757,10758,10759,10760,10761,10762,10763,10764,10765,10766,10767,10768,10769,10770,10771

Just Hoods:

10706,10709,10712,1075,10718,10721,10724,10727,10730,10733,10736,10739,10742,10745,10748,10751,10754,10757,10760,10763,10766,10769,10771

Just Capes:

10704,10705,10707,10708,10710,10711,10713,10714,10716,10717,10719,10720,10722,10723,10725,10726,10728,10729,10731,10732,10734,10735,10737,10738,10740,10741,10743,10744,10746,10747,10749,10750,10752,10753,10755,10756,10758,10759,10761,10762,10764,10765,10767,10768,10770

This could also be used in the item4.java to like add it to the right slot… :S

Goodluck!

(This is for newbs that don’t want to spend time adding a bunch of codes… I know it’s not hard to do this but since I did it already I thought this would help… Lol)
